column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------  A preliminary report said that on the morning of July 05

column1: police in Sangkat 4 raided a property and arrested 2 Chinese men.------The pair are accused of being involved in kidnappings
of Chinese nationals in the area of ​​Sangkat 4
column3: the suspects were brought to the provincial police commission to file a case for legal proceedings.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/458406
